censor.translation[0].definitions[0].def: to examine books, films, letters etc to remove anything that is considered offensive, morally harmful, or politically dangerous etc
censor.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: The information given to the press was carefully censored by the Ministry of Defence.
censor.translation[1].definitions[0].def: someone whose job is to examine books, films, letters etc and remove anything considered to be offensive, morally harmful, or politically dangerous
